name: Valet Panic
description:
You're a Valet, and you're bad at your job. 

Find parking spaces for all the cars and keep your job for another day.

Controls: 

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move.
  • Space key to use handbrake
  • Escape to quit the game
  • Mouse to control the camera (if you really want)

Car models are from Quaternius (https://www.patreon.com/quaternius).
